subject: Testing constructors?
msgSnippet: Hi all. I was just wondering what was the common practice on testing constructors. Should they be tested. If not why not? Btw Thanks all for replies to my
messageBody:
Hi all.

I was just wondering what was the common practice on testing
constructors.
Should they be tested. If not why not?

Btw Thanks all for replies to my previous post, it's been a great help.

Thanks in advance.
Pico
